name: HolidayCountdown
0:
”Alexa, ask holiday countdown how many days until Thanksgiving”
”Alexa, ask holiday countdown how long until mothers day”
”Alexa, ask holiday countdown how many days away Halloween is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday countdown
des:
Ever wondering how far away a certain holiday* is? With this skill, you can simply ask Alexa and she will tell you how many days away that holiday is! 


*pertains to major US holidays only
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
